title: Selaine Saxby – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Selaine Saxby, the Conservative MP for North Devon, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content:
I stand by what I said in the summer and believe Rishi Sunak is the only person who can effectively manage the economy and lead us through the many issues we currently face.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
